title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: The report design currently stores the absolute path of the library include. For example: <property name="fileName" value="/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary"/><property name="namespace" value="lib1"/>
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is located at $project/test, the relative path should be used.
